title: [Chinese Language][Learning] Shijie Zhi Zui
description:
[Chinese Language][Learning] Shijie Zhi Zui
----------------------------------------------------------------------

  brought to you by DaoBan

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Content:

PDF that came with two books that I have.

Techincally, these are kids books.  But, I think they are appropriate for anyone that is learning Chinese.

Text of the books/pdf are in Simplified Chinese and Pinyin.

The topics covered are the "-est" of things.
-Best, Biggest, Longest, Tallest, etc 
-Sections on animals, people, places, etc

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes on the files:

One .pdf
-I changed the title of the pdf from Chinese to Pinyin, but all of the bookmarks within the pdf are still in Chinese
